evidence.text: The Court enjoins Defendant from enforcing City Ordinances against the plaintiff class as follows: ... c. Defendant is enjoined from enforcing ... from 9:00 p.m. to 7:30 a.m. during the months of April through September and from 7:00 p.m. to 7:30 a.m. during the months of October to March ...
The Court grants plaintiffs’ motion for summary judgment in part and denies it in part ...
